item.title: Mapper
item.description: üóÉÔ∏è Mapper is the main database interface app. It contains the user management, data entry and organisation and exposes a REST API.

item.title: Mapper development
item.description: Development setup Frontend The frontend is a standard Vue.JS application, you need NodeJS installed to run the development environment and build the final app.

item.title: Mapper deployment
item.description: Deployment setup Heroku You can run mapper on Heroku’s ‘hobby’ infrastructure. You need two heroku apps, one for the backend and one for the frontend.

item.title: Mapper backend
item.description: Backend The backend is a Rails application that exposes various API endpoints. Ruby version 3.0.0 System dependencies

item.title: Mapper frontend
item.description: Mapper Frontend Project setup yarn install Compiles and hot-reloads for development yarn serve Compiles and minifies for production yarn build Lints and fixes files yarn lint Customize configuration See Configuration Reference.

item.title: Briefkasten
item.description: üìÆ Briefkasten is a standalone app used for case reporting. It renders a form from configuration and forwards submitted content to the desired email address.

item.title: 3rd update
item.description: What did I do? I finished modeling, API and entry interface for what I call option lists (defining an option itself, like type of weapon used and then defining items on that).

item.title: 2nd update, week 2 and 3
item.description: Times flies by! What did I do? On the tech side I was thinking about and started implementing models for application settings and pre-defined option lists for certain properties.

item.title: Week 1 in review
item.description: On March 1st the 9th round of the Prototype Fund has officially begun and we’re a part of it! After the initial kickoff workshop past Monday and the last bits of paperwork out of the way, the first week was all about setting up the initial infrastructure.

item.title: About tech.feminizidmap.org
item.description: Feminizidmap.org is a research project on femi(ni)cides in Germany. See the main website for definitions of femi(ni)cide and methodology. Tech.Feminizidmap.org, this project, is a software research project with the goal of developing tools to support the volunteers and the process of documentation cases of femi(ni)cides.

item.title: Project init
item.description: Hello, World! This is just a small entry to kick-start this blog on the development of mapper and other apps and software helping document and map femi(ni)cides in Germany.
